measure.CatchLine: Requires the Land Conservation and Development Commission to adopt model ordinances by which a city outside of Metro with a population of less than 25,000 may add lands to its urban growth boundary.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act makes LCDC adopt model rules for UGB amendments for small cities. (Flesch Readability Score: 69.9). 
	Requires the Land Conservation and Development Commission to adopt model ordinances by which a city outside of Metro with a population of less than 25,000 may add lands to its urban growth boundary. 
	Limits the bases for appeal of an ordinance adopted by a local government based on a model ordinance of the commission relating to housing or urbanization. 
	Takes effect on the 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to land use planning model ordinances; creating new provisions; amending ORS 197A.025; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to land use planning model ordinances; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
